main_definition: Surgery is a medical procedure that involves the treatment of injuries or conditions in the body by cutting, altering, or repairing tissues with instruments.

meanings_and_examples.example: I had to undergo heart surgery after my diagnosis of a blocked artery.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A branch of medicine that deals with the treatment of diseases by manual or instrumental exploration inward of the body cavities and organs
meanings_and_examples.example: He is studying to become an orthopedic surgeon, focusing on bone-related injuries.
She had a successful knee replacement surgery that improved her mobility.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The practice or profession of performing operations on people to improve their health, relieve pain, or correct deformities
meanings_and_examples.example: Many medical students aspire to become surgeons after completing their training.
